description:
As light filters through the spring foliage and bush warblers sing all around them, the students of Asahigaoka Branch School set off to pick some wild edible plants. Komari teaches Hotaru, who is gathering wild plants for the first time, which types are edible. And as they continue their hunt, Renge once again starts to suspect that they really do live in the country...
Source: crunchyroll
